name: Clinical M
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note 1:**  Distant lymph node involvement is considered N2 for TNM staging for retinoblastoma and is collected in distant metastasis (M). 

**Note 2:**  Code single and multiple metastatic lesions in this field based on the presentation of metastases in all distant sites excluding distant lymph nodes.

**Note 3:**  Consider metastasis to bone marrow as a single site of involvement.
footnotes: *This subcategory of clinical M1 is not defined by UICC in the 7th edition. Approval has been provided by UICC to use the definition found in the registrar note.
rows:
Unknown; distant metastasis not stated
Distant metastasis cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record

Note: M1 has subcategories of  M1a, M1b, M1c, M1d and M1e. Assign M1 only when there is no information available to assign one of the subcategories

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph nodes

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1[NOS]

Single metastasis to sites other than CNS

Stated as M1a

Multiple metastasis to sites other than CNS

Stated as M1b

CNS metastasis
CNS location not specified

Stated as M1c

Discrete mass(es) with leptomeningeal and/or CSF involvement
Postchiasmatic lesions

Stated as M1d

Leptomeningeal and/or Cerebral Spine Fluid (CSF) involvement

Stated as M1e
